message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $200 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $125 right now.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I'm still interested in selling the product to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $175. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $175 is still a bit high for me, but I'm willing to go up to $140.  I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand that $175 is still a bit high for you, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $155. It's a great price, and I think you'll really love the product.
